attributes.review: I downloaded this app to find pretty pictures of the big fat Cheeto, and as soon as it downloaded, my dog started throwing up Cheetos!!! Like what the heck!! We took her to the vet and the doctor said she was cursed with ugly Cheeto disorder. Where as soon as a dog sees an ugly Cheeto, they start throwing up. If I knew this is what would’ve happened, I would’ve just bought a non diseased bag of Cheeto puffs from Safeway.
attributes.title: So yucky
